channel.title: How do I add items to a spot?
channel.description: I want to add a altar to a bank but Idk how tell me?

item.title: How do I add items to a spot?
item.dc:creator: @Pilldom Pilldom
item.description:
@Pilldom wrote:

Ok, its really easy. Simply go to your client.java. Then search global objects. You should get a list of something that will say, Makeglobalobject then some numbers. The first set of the numbers is the items x axis location. The second its y axis location. The third is the item id of the object you want to put down. the other numbers the fourth is what way you want the object to be facing.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I add items to a spot?
